roleset.name: worthy of spending time on

role.descr: worthy of what, if explicitly stated

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Medi-Tmprl1to8. Relation to worth.02.

example.name: arg1
example.text: It would be worthwhile to get a consultation from medical geneticist , and we would arrange for that .
example.arg: to get a consultation from medical geneticist

example.name: both args
example.text: We sometimes get lost as to what is worthwhile of our attention and what is simply wasting our time.
